thread.title: Liverpool striker Daniel Sturridge takes break from injury rehab for London lunch date with mystery woman
thread.title_full: Liverpool striker Daniel Sturridge takes break from injury rehab for London lunch date with mystery woman

author: Liam Corless
title: Liverpool striker Daniel Sturridge takes break from injury rehab for London lunch date with mystery woman
text:
Sport Liverpool striker Daniel Sturridge takes break from injury rehab for London lunch date with mystery woman Sturridge is currently out with a hip problem and his last appearance for the Reds came in February's 2-0 loss at Hull Share Daniel Sturridge and a mystery woman in London on Thursday (Photo: ALTANR) Share Get Liverpool FC   Thank you for subscribing!   
Daniel Sturridge took a break from his injury rehab on Thursday as he was spotted on a lunch date in London with a mystery woman. 
The Liverpool and England striker was photographed at Cecconis Resturant in Mayfair looking dapper in an all-black outfit apart from his light blue trainers. 
Sturridge is currently out with a hip problem and his last appearance for the Reds came in February's 2-0 loss at Hull. 
The striker's Liverpool teammates who aren't currently on international duty are in Tenerife preparing for the Merseyside derby on April 1. 
Last week Anfield icon John Barnes urged Sturridge to stay at Liverpool beyond the end of the season in the face of increasing speculation that he might leave. Sturridge hasn't played for Liverpool since early February (Photo: Liverpool FC) The forward is currently nursing a hip problem (Photo: PA) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
